thread.title: Kew Media Group - Agreed To Acquire Essential Quail Media For An Initial Purchase Price Of AUD$32.8 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Kew Media Group - Agreed To Acquire Essential Quail Media For An Initial Purchase Price Of AUD$32.8 Mln

organizations.name: acquire essential quail media for an initial purchase price of aud$32.8 mln  kew media group inc

text:
April 30, 2018 / 11:55 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Kew Media Group - Agreed To Acquire Essential Quail Media For An Initial Purchase Price Of AUD$32.8 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Kew Media Group Inc:
* KEW MEDIA GROUP - HAS AGREED TO ACQUIRE ESSENTIAL QUAIL MEDIA GROUP FOR AN INITIAL PURCHASE PRICE OF AUD$32.8 MILLION
* KEW MEDIA GROUP - DEAL IS COMPRISED OF AUD$20 MILLION IN CASH & AUD$12.8 MILLION IN CLASS B SHARES OF KEW VALUED AT C$10.00 PER SHARE Source text: ( bit.ly/2JAXUSA ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
